ygData.subject: Re: AE spell. 24th what one is good?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s RUNES first of all. And second of all, I m level 25 and I already have all my runes for all my 29 spells (doubles in most cases, in case I fail) and
ygData.messageBody:
James wrote:
>
> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> The spells cast Force,Column of lighting and Lightning storm are my 3 AE
> spells I can make for this level. Do I realy need 3. ?Can you tell me what
> one or 2 are the best pleas?
>
> One other question.I am close to 24th level. I am finding that I cant get
> all the ruins I need to make each levels spells. I know you all have that
> problem. Was wondering if any one know's some one on the Innourkk server
> that sells spells?
>

It's RUNES first of all. And second of all, I'm level 25 and I already
have all my runes for all my 29 spells (doubles in most cases, in case I
fail) and many runes for 34 and 39.

How?

I just have a hot button that auctions that I'm buying runes and I click
it every time I enter a zone and every 10 minutes or so later as I stay
in the zone. All these runes I got from high levels who have tons of
them and just want to get rid of them. I usually traded or bought most.

A good idea about research is to put all points possible each level into
it. Personally, I've made all possible spells, some twice, and I've only
failed twice, maybe three times. Each time you try there is a chance
your skill will go up too.

--
Sergey
--

KPS, PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
